info.title: The Brønnøysund Registries
info.description: The Brønnøysund registries (Brønnøysundregistrene) is a Norwegian state administrative agency consisting of 18 different state electronic registers. The purpose is to create order and simplification for the business community and for the public.

get.description: Returns all or search entities registered under https://www.brreg.no/
Returns a single entity by organization number (Existing or Deleted)
Returns all roles for a specific entity

get.summary: Get all or search sub entities
get.description: Returns all or search sub entities registered under https://www.brreg.no/

get.summary: Get sub entity by organization number
get.description: Returns a single sub entity by organization number (Existing or Deleted)
Search for recently updated entities in the registry
Search for recently updated sub entities in the registry
